brainly_data.question:
Based on what you have read, what is Steinbeck's attitude toward the banks? 
(The Grapes of Wrath)
A. he feels sorry for them.
B. he is disgusted by them.
C. he respects them.
D. he is proud of them.
brainly_data.subject: English
